criterion: Provides a general overview of antibiotic resistance and its consequences
States that antibiotic misuse is a major contributor to antibiotic resistance
Suggests that the user consult a healthcare professional for personalized advice
Uses clear and concise language to explain antibiotic resistance and its consequences
Does not provide specific examples of antibiotic misuse or resistance
Incorrectly states that antibiotic resistance is only a problem in developing countries
Fails to provide information on how to prevent antibiotic resistance
Uses technical jargon or overly complex language to explain antibiotic resistance
Does not acknowledge the potential consequences of antibiotic resistance
Provides a false or misleading statement about the effectiveness of antibiotics
Asks the user to seek medical attention immediately without providing context
